Episodes.Title: Destination: Royston Vasey
Episodes.Plot: The carnival comes to town and Pauline starts at the Restart Room as a jobseeker. Val makes a wish on a magic toad that brings back Benjamin. A nosebleed epidemic breaks out at the circus.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references
Episodes.Writer: Jeremy Dyson, Mark Gatiss, Steve Pemberton, Reece Sh

Episodes.Title: Lust for Royston Vasey
Episodes.Plot: The nosebleed epidemic continues. Pauline gets a new job as an assistant food science operative at Burger Me! Herr Lipp and students arrive on an exchange visit from Diusberg, and the guesthouse closes for a very private function.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references
Episodes.Writer: Jeremy Dyson, Mark Gatiss, Steve Pemberton, Reece Sh

Episodes.Title: A Plague on Royston Vasey
Episodes.Plot: Pen-obsessed Pauline tackles Ross about her job prospects or lack thereof, and Edward sets a trap to catch a bride for David. Butcher Hilary Briss has a problem with one of his "special" customers.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references
Episodes.Writer: Jeremy Dyson, Mark Gatiss, Steve Pemberton, Reece Sh

Episodes.Title: Death in Royston Vasey
Episodes.Plot: Hilary Briss and Maurice take an early walk in the woods to collect a "Special Delivery." Mike, Brian, and Geoff get lost on their way to a plastics convention, and Morris is dealt with.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references
Episodes.Writer: Jeremy Dyson, Mark Gatiss, Steve Pemberton, Reece Sh

Episodes.Title: Anarchy in Royston Vasey
Episodes.Plot: Pauline leaves her hostage with Mikey to go in search fo food. Geoff and Brian bury Mike alive, and Tubbs and Edward catch a no-tail. Lee finds that Creme Brulee has reformed without him.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references
Episodes.Writer: Jeremy Dyson, Mark Gatiss, Steve Pemberton, Reece Sh

Episodes.Title: Royston Vasey and the Monster from Hell
Episodes.Plot: Roysten Vasey is quarantined as the nosebleed epidemic claims a distinguished victim. The Legz Akimbo Theatre Group comes to town, and there is a wedding at the local shop.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references
Episodes.Writer: Jeremy Dyson, Mark Gatiss, Steve Pemberton, Reece Sh
